meanings.definition: A person who studies or specializes in the study of malaria.
meanings.sent1: The malariologists conducted research on how to prevent malaria.
meanings.sent2: The malariologists published a new study on malaria transmission.
meanings.sent3: The malariologists joked that they were immune to mosquito bites from all their fieldwork.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against malaria, malariologists are the frontline warriors.
meanings.sent5: The malariologists' dedication to eradicating malaria is truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: The group of scientists or researchers who focus on the study of malaria.
meanings.sent1: Many malariologists gathered at the conference to share their findings.
meanings.sent2: The malariologists collaborated on a global initiative to combat malaria.
meanings.sent3: The malariologists celebrated a breakthrough in mosquito net technology.
meanings.sent4: The unity among malariologists is crucial in the fight against malaria.
meanings.sent5: The world relies on malariologists to lead the charge against malaria.
